data.title: JANAF and Litasco SA conclude new contract
data.meta_description: The companies have concluded a new contract on crude oil storage from November 2020 until April 2021.
data.text:
Jadranski naftovod (JANAF Plc) have concluded a new contract on crude oil storage with Litasco SA from November 2020 until April 2021.

JANAF Plc have also concluded a contract on crude oil storage with BP Oil International Ltd until the end of March 2021.

The JANAF management board said: “A new contract with Litasco, a world’s major company specialised for crude oil and petroleum product trading, and the cooperation realised with BP, as well as other users of our services, are the confirmation of reputation and opportunities that JANAF has on the Mediterranean spot oil market with the global oil companies, as well as oil traders.”

For the forthcoming period, JANAF has concluded contracts on crude oil storage with Croatian Hydrocarbon Agency, INA, MOL, Glencore, Petraco, Litasco SA and BP; contracts on crude oil transport with INA and MOL; and contracts for the storage of petroleum products with the Croatian Hydrocarbon Agency and Crodux.
